metadata.title: CVE-2016-7942 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The XGetImage function in X.org libX11 before 1.6.4 might allow remote Xservers to gain privileges via vectors involving image type and geometry,which triggers out-of-bounds read operations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.4-1
libx11-data - 2:1.6.4-1
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libx11 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.4-1').
